item.title: Browsing XML History
item.summary: The app will log which sites you browse. The record will be uploaded to the management console.

item.title: Camera
item.summary: Required for taking XML sample photos.

item.title: Phone
item.summary: Placing sample calls and sending XML text messages.

item.title: Location
item.summary: Sampling GPS, XML or another location service.

item.title: Network
item.summary: Connect to sample services on the XML internet.

item.title: AN Other Permission
item.summary: Another XML permission with a custom icon goes here.

enterprisePolicy.description: Tap here to read your company's privacy policy. (Opens example.com in this sample.)
